price: Usibye Ibilisi (Shitani) wagize ubwibone maze akaba mu bahakanye.
arabic: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: illā ib'līsa is'takbara wakāna mina al-kāfirīna
